Taste of life

Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.

Catering

kebab

Our Speciality

Delhi
Darbar

Delhi Darbar name itself represents the royal and ethnic culture of Indian heritage and we are proud to bring just that for you in the form of food, the only thing that truly nourishes. We present to you the list of Indian cuisines prepared from one of the finest spices and herbs which make your taste buds dive into history, reminding of the time what Delhi used to be, in Mughal period.

Our Special Dishes

Darbar chicken biryani

Clients Rating:

Darbar’s biryani, for instance, is made with the customary Aloo.
The congested locality in which it is situated deters many from venturing there.
Only the die-hard fans continue to take the trouble to patronise it, or those who happen to be in the vicinity.

Our Special Dishes

Delhi Darbar Xpcl Kebab

Clients Rating:

Chicken tangdi kebab was one of the best Kebab I ever had. It was spicy, tangy and
the pieces of the chicken were succulent and was really cooked well.

Our Special Dishes

Darbar chicken chaap

Clients Rating:

The speciality of the house is the Biryani.Beaten pieces of meat are
marinated in their own special spices and then shallow fried in oil on an iron tawa.
